fields.name: isInitialized
docs: Is the swap initialized, with data written to it

fields.name: bumpSeed
docs: Bump seed used to generate the program address / authority

fields.name: tokenProgramId
docs: Token program ID associated with the swap

fields.name: tokenAAccount
docs: Address of token A liquidity account

fields.name: tokenBAccount
docs: Address of token B liquidity account

types.name: AmmFees
docs: Encapsulates all fee information and calculations for swap operations

types.name: CurveType
docs: Curve types supported by the token-swap program.

errors.name: AlreadyInUse
errors.msg: Swap account already in use

errors.name: InvalidProgramAddress
errors.msg: Invalid program address generated from bump seed and key

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors.name: InvalidOutputOwner
errors.msg: Output pool account owner cannot be the program address

errors.name: ExpectedMint
errors.msg: Deserialized account is not an SPL Token mint

errors.name: ExpectedAccount
errors.msg: Deserialized account is not an SPL Token account

errors.name: EmptySupply
errors.msg: Input token account empty

errors.name: InvalidSupply
errors.msg: Pool token mint has a non-zero supply

errors.name: InvalidDelegate
errors.msg: Token account has a delegate

errors.name: InvalidInput
errors.msg: InvalidInput

errors.name: IncorrectSwapAccount
errors.msg: Address of the provided swap token account is incorrect

errors.name: IncorrectPoolMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided pool token mint is incorrect

errors.name: InvalidOutput
errors.msg: InvalidOutput

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: General calculation failure due to overflow or underflow

errors.name: InvalidInstruction
errors.msg: Invalid instruction

errors.name: RepeatedMint
errors.msg: Swap input token accounts have the same mint

errors.name: ExceededSlippage
errors.msg: Swap instruction exceeds desired slippage limit

errors.name: InvalidCloseAuthority
errors.msg: Token account has a close authority

errors.name: InvalidFreezeAuthority
errors.msg: Pool token mint has a freeze authority

errors.name: IncorrectFeeAccount
errors.msg: Pool fee token account incorrect

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: FeeCalculationFailure
errors.msg: Fee calculation failed due to overflow, underflow, or unexpected 0

errors.name: ConversionFailure
errors.msg: Conversion to u64 failed with an overflow or underflow

errors.name: InvalidFee
errors.msg: The provided fee does not match the program owner's constraints

errors.name: IncorrectTokenProgramId
errors.msg: The provided token program does not match the token program expected by the swap

errors.name: IncorrectOracleAccount
errors.msg: Address of the provided oracle account is incorrect

errors.name: IncorrectConfigAccount
errors.msg: Address of the provided config account is incorrect

errors.name: UnsupportedCurveType
errors.msg: The provided curve type is not supported by the program owner

errors.name: InvalidCurve
errors.msg: The provided curve parameters are invalid

errors.name: UnsupportedCurveOperation
errors.msg: The operation cannot be performed on the given curve

errors.name: InvalidPythStatus
errors.msg: Pyth oracle status is not 'trading'

errors.name: InvalidPythPrice
errors.msg: Could not retrieve updated price feed from the Pyth oracle

errors.name: IncorrectSigner
errors.msg: Address of the provided signer account is incorrect

errors.name: ExceedPoolBalance
errors.msg: Swap amount exceeds pool balance

errors.name: ProgramIsFrozen
errors.msg: Program is frozen

errors.name: OracleConfidence
errors.msg: Oracle confidence is too high

errors.name: OverCapAmount
errors.msg: Over Pool Cap Amount

errors.name: InvalidUpdateAccount
errors.msg: Invalid update wallet address

errors.name: InvalidUpdateParam
errors.msg: Invalid update param

errors.name: InvalidInnerSwapAccount
errors.msg: Invalid inner swap account

errors.name: ExceptionErr
errors.msg: Exception err
